a conference last month, said there "has been this nervousness, partly as a result of listening to political consultants... that you can't seem to be threatening voters" about voting for taxes. There's this worry about the optics of all that. I understand that- voters don't want to be threatened, and voters shouldn't be threatened, Bill Lockyer said. "However, you also have to be honest with them about what the consequences will be if the only policy option is an all-cut budget. And no one has yet produced that."

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday M. Night Shyamalan . "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
